position_1.opening_hook: Meet Meera, whose hands have been creating magic for 20+ years...
position_1.caption: Meet Meera, a master embroidery artisan whose delicate hands have been weaving dreams into fabric for over two decades. From her small village workshop, she creates intricate beadwork that adorns luxury gowns worn on red carpets worldwide. Each piece takes 40+ hours of meticulous handwork, preserving techniques passed down through generations.

position_2.opening_hook: Watch 48 hours of embroidery magic in 15 seconds ⚡
position_2.caption: 48 hours of meticulous handwork condensed into pure magic ✨ This French knot technique requires 2,000+ individual stitches to create just one flower motif. Our artisans use silk threads from sustainable sources and hand-selected crystals that catch light from every angle.

position_3.opening_hook: When embroidery becomes poetry written in thread and gold ✨
position_3.caption: Poetry written in thread and 24k gold. This hand-embroidered panel features over 15,000 French knots and took our master artisan 6 weeks to complete. Crafted using GOTS-certified organic silk and recycled gold thread.

position_4.opening_hook: From plastic waste to luxury fashion - the circular economy in action 🔄
position_4.caption: From ocean plastic to runway luxury - witness the circular economy in action. These iridescent sequins were once discarded plastic bottles, now transformed into sustainable embellishments for haute couture.

position_5.opening_hook: Master the art of French knots with this step-by-step guide 🎓
position_5.caption: Master one of embroidery's most elegant techniques! French knots add incredible texture and dimension to luxury embroidery. Here's how our artisans create these tiny masterpieces with consistent tension and perfect uniformity.

position_6.opening_hook: Behind every Arazzo piece: a community of passionate artisans ☀️
position_6.caption: Behind luxury embroidery lies a community of passionate artisans. Our workshop environment promotes creativity, fair wages, healthcare benefits, and flexible hours ensure our team thrives. This collaborative space produces not just exquisite embroidery, but lasting friendships.

position_7.opening_hook: Ancient techniques meet modern innovation - tradition evolves 🏛️
position_7.caption: 500-year-old techniques enhanced by modern innovation. While we honor traditional Zardozi and Chikankari methods passed down through generations, we've integrated eco-friendly materials and ergonomic tools.

position_8.opening_hook: From our atelier to the world's most prestigious runways ✨
position_8.caption: From sketch to runway - witness our embroidery journey! This hand-beaded collection took 300+ hours to complete and features sustainable crystals and organic silk. See the transformation from concept to red carpet.

position_9.opening_hook: When you touch luxury, you feel the difference. Every. Single. Thread. 🤏
position_9.caption: Feel the luxury before you see it. These are OEKO-TEX certified silk threads with 120 denier count - the finest available. Each strand is tested for strength, colorfastness, and environmental safety.
